parameter.name: ewellman-shoppingapp-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: ewellman-shoppingapp Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Server=coderfoundry.cloudapp.net,55555; Database=ewellman-shoppingapp; User ID=ewellman; Password=***REMOVED***; Persist Security Info=True; Connection Timeout=30;
